ygData.subject: Hollow Skull *Spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I found a Hollow Skull in Paw the other day and have tried to figure out its uses.  No it does nto combine the Skull of Jhen Tra and the RTS, If
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,
I found a Hollow Skull in Paw the other day and have tried to figure out
its uses. No it does nto combine the Skull of Jhen'Tra and the RTS, "If
even possible at all". Supposedly it is used to create some Necro staff but
I have been unable to find any pices to it yet. The skull has 2
compartments and a Combine button. If anyone know how to use this I would
greatly appreciate it.

Shadair
19th Wizard
Karana

> Skull of Jhen Tra is "Staff Skull" found on Embalmers in Lake
> Rathetear. You can also find the coveted Runed Totem staff on the
> Gnoll High Shamans there.
>
> Ziffnab
